text_block_list.text: As each racing Umamusume carries the expectations of the spectators on their shoulders—Matikanetannhauser was no exception.
When asked by the interviewer about 'the girl she's cheering for,' the round-glasses-wearing reporter immediately named 'Matikanetannhauser.'
Meanwhile, in the paddock, Matikanetannhauser received a declaration of war from Mejiro McQueen, who said, 'I can feel your recent rapid growth firsthand.'
The 'Takarazuka Kinen' is filled with unique Umamusume! I want to stay focused and aim for victory!
